aforesaid, he was <s>sounded probed <\s> sounded regularly every day, mor-
-ning<s>s<\s> and evening <s>s<\s>, till the 15th April next, during 
all which time the Patient suffered no pains, <s>lost 
nothing of his complexion <\s> did not fall away, nor had any <s>sure signs 
of <\s> symptoms of sickness upon him.
On the 15th of April, being the third <s>Holy <\s> day of Easter, Holy day 
he supped with his usual appetite, but half an 
hour after supper he was seized with a violent 
<s>shivering <\s> shaking Fit, which lasted a <s>good <\s> full hour, upon which a burning 
fe<s>a<\s>ver ensued, attended with an unquenchable thirst <s>a drought that 
could was not to be quenched <\s> and with great Head-
-ake and an extraordinary restlessness.
In this condition I found the Patient about 
8 in the evening, being the hour I usually went to 
<s>sound probe <\s> sound him. I immediately prepared myself to 
<s>sound probe <\s> sound him according to custom, thinking thereby 
to <s>easy <\s> procure him some ease. Till then the 
<s>Probe Sound <\s> Catheter had entered without any obstacle, but 
this time <s>when<\s> upon my pushing it into the 
Bladder I felt a stone which obstructed its 
passage; I turned the <s>Probe <\s> Catheter to the Left, and 
hit upon one of the Branches of the Stone, which you 
have <s>hereby <\s> with this in a Print <s>that has been <\s> engraved 
by order of the Marquis de Caumont <s>after <\s> from the Stone
